sentences.en: Ben Heine is a painter, illustrator, portraitist, caricaturist and photographer.
sentences.cn: Ben Heine 是一个画家、插画家、肖像画家、漫画家和、摄影家。

sentences.en: Both of us had chosen Simmie Knox to paint our portraits: we liked Knox’s lifelike style, and he would be the first African-American portraitist to have his work hang in the White House.
sentences.cn: 我俩都选了西米·诺克斯来为我们画像：我们欣赏他逼真的风格，他也将成为第一位将作品悬挂在白宫的非裔画家。

sentences.en: His tightly framed study of the portraitist is unexpectedly moving investigation of the artistic process.
sentences.cn: 他对这位肖像画家的结构严谨的研究出乎意料地推动了对艺术过程的研究。

sentences.en: Rembrandt began to work as a professional portraitist about 1631.
sentences.cn: 伦勃朗成为一名职业画家的时间约是1631年。

words.tran_cn: 肖像画；肖像绘制；人像摄影
记述者；描画者；肖像画家

trans.tran_cn: 肖像画家，人像摄影家，画师
trans.tran_en: A portraitist is an artist who paints or draws people's portraits
